UsageEntitlementEntry.name: UsageEntitlementEntry
UsageEntitlementEntry.description: Represents the usage entitlement details, such as the usage consumption, rollovers, and details of expired units for each tenure.

ClosingBalance.description: The quantity of the entitlement after adjusting the transaction quantity for the current entitlement validity period.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the usage entitlement entry ends.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the usage entitlement entry starts.

EntitlementBucketId.description: The usage entitlement bucket that's associated with the entitlement entry.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the usage entitlement entry record.

OpeningBalance.description: The starting quantity of the entitlement for the current entitlement validity period.

ParentEntitlementBucketId.description: The parent usage entitlement bucket record that's associated with the entitlement entry.

TransactionDate.description: The date when the transaction usage entitlement entry was updated.

TransactionQuantity.description: The quantity of the entitlement used during the current entitlement validity period.

TransactionReason.description: The reason for the usage entitlement entry.

TransactionUsageEntitlementId.description: The transaction usage entitlement that's associated with this usage entitlement entry.

TransactionalBucketId.description: The usage entitlement bucket that's used to debit the consumption of entitlements.

UomId.description: The unit of measure that's associated with the usage entitlement.

UsageSummaryId.description: The usage summary that's associated with the usage entitlement. Available in API version 64.0 and later.
